name: InsideTheDice
description:
Game idea: What would be if a player is placed inside the empty dice and populates it with its dots? 

Mental planning of how to place, a little of confusion, that's  the core gameplay.

Unfortunately, not all ideas found their way into the game, there is even no audio or other fancy stuff. Game jam... sigh.

The tutorial will be shown first time in the main menu. The future sequence will be shown, of how the dice will move and rotate. From this point the player can predict which side will be at the end, and try to place the biggest or smallest number of dots on it.

In case WebGl is not playing, there is a zip for Windows executable.
